trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that generates a customized document for projects developed for the 2007 Microsoft Office system.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务生成针对 2007 Microsoft Office 系统开发的项目的自定义文档。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Set all of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document> properties and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> to run this task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document>属性，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>若要运行此任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document> generates a customized document based on a path to a source document, deployment manifest, and customization assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document> 生成基于源文档、 部署清单和自定义程序集的路径的自定义的文档。

trans-unit.source: To check whether a customized document needs updating, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document>.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查自定义的文档是否需要更新，请使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document>。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a customization assembly to attach to a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要附加到文档的自定义程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of a customization assembly.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示自定义项程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.AssemblyName%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.AssemblyName%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative or fully qualified path of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置部署清单的相对或完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the relative or fully qualified path of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示部署清单的相对或完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifestName%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifestName%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative or fully qualified path of the project document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项目文档的相对路径或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the relative or fully qualified path of the document.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示文档的相对或完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.DocumentPath%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.DocumentPath%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Generates a customized document for a project developed for the 2007 Microsoft Office system.
trans-unit.target: 生成针对 2007 Microsoft Office 系统开发的项目的自定义文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document has been generated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已成功生成文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the relative or fully qualified path of the installation folder.
trans-unit.target: 设置安装文件夹的相对路径或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.InstallationPath%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.InstallationPath%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make all the paths in the application manifest relative to the document location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使应用程序清单中的所有路径都是文档位置的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all the paths in the application manifest should be relative to the document location; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果应用程序清单中的所有路径应都为相对于文档的位置;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Local%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Local%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the GUID of an Office solution.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Office 解决方案的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the GUID of an Office solution.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 Office 解决方案的 GUID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.SolutionID%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.SolutionID%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to remove a customization assembly from a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否从文档中删除自定义程序集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the customization is to be removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果自定义项是要删除;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。
